actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Market Transition Act to establish a program to provide dairy farmers a price safety net for small- and medium-sized dairy producers.
short_title: National Dairy Farmers Fairness Act of 2001

summary.text: National Dairy Farmers Fairness Act of 2001 - Amends the Agricultural Market Transition Act to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to provide assistance (on a sliding scale) to Class III milk producers who have experienced qualifying price or quantity reductions.

titles.title: National Dairy Farmers Fairness Act of 2001
A bill to amend the Agricultural Market Transition Act to establish a program to provide dairy farmers a price safety net for small- and medium-sized dairy producers.
